titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey vessels to Assistance International, Inc. (a nonprofit corporation).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 9/23/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary to convey, without compensation, three named vessels to the nonprofit corporation Assistance International, Inc., for use in emergencies, vocational training, and economic development programs.
